verses.verse: Let a man<WG444> so<WG3779> account<WG3049> of us, as of the ministers<WG5257> of Christ,<WG5547> and stewards<WG3623> of the mysteries<WG3466> of God.<WG2316>
Moreover<WG3739> it is required<WG2212> in stewards,<WG3623> that a man<WG5100> be found<WG2147> faithful.<WG4103>

But with me it is a very<WG1646> small<WG1646> thing that I should be judged<WG350> of you, or<WG2228> of man's<WG442> judgment:<WG2250> yes,<WG235> I judge<WG350> not my<WG1683> own<WG1683> self.<WG1683>
For I know<WG1492> nothing<WG3762> by myself;<WG1683> yet<WG235> am I not hereby<WG1722> <WG5129> justified:<WG1344> but he that judges<WG350> me is the Lord.<WG2962>

Therefore<WG5620> judge<WG2919> nothing<WG3385> before<WG4253> the time,<WG2540> until<WG2193> the Lord<WG2962> come,<WG2064> who<WG3739> both<WG2532> will bring<WG5461> to light<WG5461> the hidden<WG2927> things of darkness,<WG4655> and will make<WG5319> manifest<WG5319> the counsels<WG1012> of the hearts:<WG2588> and then<WG5119> shall every<WG1538> man have<WG1096> praise<WG1868> of God.<WG2316>

And these<WG5023> things, brothers,<WG80> I have in a figure<WG3345> transferred<WG3345> to myself<WG1683> and to Apollos<WG625> for your<WG5209> sakes; that you might learn<WG3129> in us not to think<WG5426> of men above<WG5228> that which<WG3739> is written,<WG1125> that no<WG3361> one<WG1520> of you be puffed<WG5448> up for one<WG1520> against<WG2596> another.<WG2087>

For who<WG5101> makes<WG1252> you to differ<WG1252> from another? and what<WG5101> have<WG2192> you that you did not receive?<WG2983> now<WG2532> if<WG1499> you did receive<WG2983> it, why<WG5101> do you glory,<WG2744> as if you had not received<WG2983> it?

Now<WG2236> you are full,<WG2880> now<WG2236> you are rich,<WG4147> you have reigned<WG936> as kings without<WG5565> us: and I would<WG3785> to God you did reign,<WG936> that we also<WG2532> might reign<WG4821> with you.

For I think<WG1380> that God<WG2316> has set<WG584> forth<WG584> us the apostles<WG652> last,<WG2078> as it were appointed<WG1935> to death:<WG1935> for we are made<WG1096> a spectacle<WG2302> to the world,<WG2889> and to angels,<WG32> and to men.<WG444>
We are fools<WG3474> for Christ's<WG5547> sake, but you are wise<WG5429> in Christ;<WG5547> we are weak,<WG772> but you are strong;<WG2478> you are honorable,<WG1741> but we are despised.<WG820>

Even to this<WG3588> present<WG737> hour<WG5610> we both<WG2532> hunger,<WG3983> and thirst,<WG1372> and are naked,<WG1130> and are buffeted,<WG2852> and have no<WG790> certain<WG790> dwelling place;<WG790>
And labor,<WG2872> working<WG2038> with our own<WG2398> hands:<WG5495> being reviled,<WG3058> we bless;<WG2127> being persecuted,<WG1377> we suffer<WG430> it:
Being defamed,<WG987> we entreat:<WG3870> we are made<WG1096> as the filth<WG4027> of the world,<WG2889> and are the offscouring<WG4067> of all<WG3956> things to this<WG737> day.<WG737>
I write<WG1125> not these<WG5023> things to shame<WG1788> you, but as my beloved<WG27> sons<WG5043> I warn<WG3560> you.

For though<WG1437> you have<WG2192> ten<WG3463> thousand<WG3563> instructors<WG3807> in Christ,<WG5547> yet<WG235> have you not many<WG4183> fathers:<WG3962> for in Christ<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424> I have begotten<WG1080> you through<WG1223> the gospel.<WG2098>
Why<WG3767> I beseech<WG3870> you, be you followers<WG3402> of me.

For this<WG5124> cause<WG1223> have I sent to you Timotheus,<WG5095> who<WG3739> is my beloved<WG27> son,<WG5043> and faithful<WG4103> in the Lord,<WG2962> who<WG3739> shall bring<WG363> you into remembrance<WG363> of my ways<WG3598> which<WG3588> be in Christ,<WG5547> as I teach<WG1321> every<WG3837> where<WG3837> in every<WG3956> church.<WG1577>
Now<WG1161> some<WG5100> are puffed<WG5448> up, as though I would not come<WG2064> to you.
But I will come<WG2064> to you shortly,<WG5030> if<WG1437> the Lord<WG2962> will,<WG2309> and will know,<WG1097> not the speech<WG3056> of them which are puffed<WG5448> up, but the power.<WG1411>
For the kingdom<WG932> of God<WG2316> is not in word,<WG3056> but in power.<WG1411>
What<WG5101> will<WG2309> you? shall I come<WG2064> to you with a rod,<WG4464> or<WG2228> in love,<WG26> and in the spirit<WG4151> of meekness?<WG4236>
